summary: Successfully verified bobber visibility fixes and button font size reductions. All critical requirements met - bobber is now properly hidden during waiting/casting states and only visible during bite state.
passed_tests: Bobber completely hidden during WAITING state (tested 2 successful casts)
Bobber correctly visible during BITE state (verified in multiple casts)
Rod indicator (small red circle) only visible during BITE state
Cast button font size reduced to 8.8px (meets 8-10px requirement)
Game functionality intact - can cast, catch fish successfully
Navigation and UI interactions working properly
No visual bobber elements during casting animation
Consistent bobber behavior across multiple casts
